description: A lightweight and compressible down jacket: the Meron Light IN Jacket Men. Extremely light and water-repellent thanks to its polyamide ripstop material. This in turn provides the jacket with an excellent heat/weight ratio. The jacket is suitable for a diverse range of activities such as mountaineering, climbing, hiking and ski touring during all seasons and its light weight makes it easy to take anywhere.
name: Mammut Meron Light IN Jacket - Mens
